summary:
Changes the Command Animal Powerto a practically more usefull one.
Now ur calling a Familiar Bear to aid u in combat.
descriptionHtml:
Intro:
The Bosmer power was by far the weakest of all races
It had Conditions so u couldnt use it all time and it was limited to Animal only.

Solution:
My new Power Calls upon a Guardian Spirit.
And what protects its babys best? A Bear Mom!
So for 60 Seconds a Bear Spirit descend to Aid you.

Information:
The Bear Levels with you, so it wont become useless after some time.

Installation: 
Use NMM


Notes from Creator:
PLS Endorse it, popular files will make creator more motivated.
And i have some pretty Interresting Mods in my mind.
for example: Readjusting Weight and Maximum Carryweight for more Realistic Gameplay with editted Horses that can carry weight and can be called (See Horse Flute Mod)
[example: U can carry max 150 (at start) but ur Horse up to 400]
author: Donkalleone
